rules_text:
When Grilling Gang enters, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
Decompose into Treasure {2}{B} [i]({2}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a colorless Treasure artifact with no mana cost and “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color,” and it loses all other card types. Decompose only as a sorcery.)[/i]
notes:
Changede name, added art
Human —> Ooze
Added decompose
